name: AVAudioUnitDistortion
desc: An object that implements a multistage distortion effect.

items.name: func loadFactoryPreset(AVAudioUnitDistortionPreset)
items.desc: Configures the audio distortion unit by loading a distortion preset.

items.name: enum AVAudioUnitDistortionPreset
items.desc: Constants that represent preset audio distortions.

items.name: var preGain: Float
items.desc: The gain that the audio unit applies to the signal before distortion, in decibels.

items.name: var wetDryMix: Float
items.desc: The blend of the distorted and dry signals.
